code: import{useEffect}from'react';var useKeyboard=function useKeyboard(onKeyup,onKeydown){useEffect(function(){var handleKeyup=function handleKeyup(e){onKeyup&&onKeyup(e.code);};var handleKeydown=function handleKeydown(e){onKeydown&&onKeydown(e.code);};document.addEventListener('keydown',handleKeydown);document.addEventListener('keyup',handleKeyup);return function(){document.removeEventListener('keydown',handleKeydown);document.removeEventListener('keyup',handleKeyup);};});};export default useKeyboard;
